question: Both borane and MCPBA react highly selectively with molecules, such as limonene, that contain double bonds in very different environments. Predict the products of reaction of limonene with **(a)** one equivalent of $BH_3$ in $THF$, followed by basic aqueous $H_2O_2$, and **(b)** one equivalent of MCPBA in $CH_2Cl_2$. Explain your answers.
